resources.string: This option, if activated, turns light on immediately when starting the application.

Use this option to activate a timer which will automatically shut light down when time limit is reached (useful to save battery when light left activated fo too long by mistake). The time limit is configurable (up to 10:45mins).
Please provide a timer limit exceeding 0ms.

This feature displays a popup whenever you try to turn light on when having battery level below a given threshold.
